014package org.microbean.producer;
015
016/**
017 * A {@link RuntimeException} indicating a problem with disposal.
018 *
019 * @author <a href="https://about.me/lairdnelson" target="_top">Laird Nelson</a>
020 */
021public class DisposalException extends RuntimeException {
022
023  private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
024
025  /**
026   * Creates a new {@link DisposalException}.
027   */
028  public DisposalException() {
029    super();
030  }
031
032  /**
033   * Creates a new {@link DisposalException}.
034   *
035   * @param message a detail message; may be {@code null}
036   */
037  public DisposalException(final String message) {
038    super(message);
039  }
040
041  /**
042   * Creates a new {@link DisposalException}.
043   *
044   * @param cause a {@link Throwable} that caused this {@link DisposalException} to be created; may be {@code null}
045   */
046  public DisposalException(final Throwable cause) {
047    super(cause);
048  }
049
050  /**
051   * Creates a new {@link DisposalException}.
052   *
053   * @param message a detail message; may be {@code null}
054   *
055   * @param cause a {@link Throwable} that caused this {@link DisposalException} to be created; may be {@code null}
056   */
057  public DisposalException(final String message, final Throwable cause) {
058    super(message, cause);
059  }
060
061}
